DOC.brief_summary: A study determine optimal dose blood level Prograf® long-term maintenance kidney transplant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Prograf® Therapy Renal Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A 3 arm study ( 2 Active , 1 Active Control ) determine optimal dose blood level Prograf® long-term maintenance kidney transplant patient
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year age time transplant . Patient least 6 month posttransplant . Patient recipient solid organ transplant kidney . Patient know carrier HIV virus .
